description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. Jump in to a party-style adventure game, bash down monsters within a minute, grab some loot and save the day! Lootfest is an action adventure game, in 3rd or 1st person view. Random generated voxel world with a fantasy setting. Up to four players, drop in, split screen co-op.
description.short: Jump in to a party-style adventure game, bash down monsters within a minute, grab some loot and save the day! Lootfest is an action adventure game, in 3rd or 1st person view. Random generated voxel world with a fantasy setting. Up to four players, drop in, split screen co-op.
